message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested, but $120 is a bit more than I'm comfortable paying.  Would you be willing to go down to $105?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. However, I have to make a profit, and $105 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $115.
